char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Okay. I will turn off the spell, but only if you do one thing to me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I might have left a bruise somewhere on your skull, but tell me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If you cut your hair with the spell off and give it to me,

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll use it to construct a wig and artificially restore my former glory.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Cutting my hair will also restore my former glory as well...

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Natural regrowth can be achieved through Yagokoro Pharmaceutical's keratin vitamins...

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Farewell. I have no intention of seeing you again...
